entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Guest 2000. Foreigners' Touristic Demand for Hungary.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E45: TÁRKI Guest 2000. Foreigners' Touristic Demand for Hungary.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: Probáld, Ákos
Szivós, Péter
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: this survey is basically an experimental survey to provide help in designing a more final questionnaire; the aim of the survey is to collect data on foreigners visiting Hungary: the frequency of visits, the structure of their expenditure, and their travel habits
entry.dcterms:subject: leisure, tourism and sport
mass political behavior, attitudes
person
survey data
cross-section

Interviewing was done at four border stations (Záhony, Biharkeresztes, Hegyeshalom, Röszke), on two trains (Budapest - Zágráb and Budapest- Hegyeshalom), and at the Ferihegy airport in Budapest among foreigners about to leave Hungary. Only tourists were asked, those working in Hungary and passengers in transit were not interviewed.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
entry.dcterms:subject: SPSS portable datafile
